basic.Target Organism: [Ref.22883213]Herpesvirus 1 McIntire (HHV-1MC):inhibition of virus replication in Vero cells(IC50=300 µM);HHV-1 clinical strain:inhibition of virus replication in Vero cells(IC50=400 µM);Coxsackie virus B2(clinical strain):inhibition of virus replication in Hep-2 cells(IC50=350 µM);inhibition of virus replication in LLC-MK2 cells(IC50=290 µM);Coxsackie virus 971 PT B2:inhibition of virus replication in HEp-2 cells(IC50=350 µM);inhibition of virus replication in LLC-MK2 cells(IC50=180 µM).
